item.description:
This is a busy week for the incubator, here's the 1st event of the new week


Time for some fun and exciting games new and old this week at the incubator. Secrets and assassins will be involved so come on out with a friend and a smile and let's make it another awesome week of at the incubator!

Also, please feel free to pass along any ideas for the group as well. Check out ttp://improvencyclopedia.org/ and let us organizers know if there's any games you'd like to try out. We are always open to suggestions!


....and stay tuned for more events this week.

Rock on!

Jason J.
item.name: Thursday the 16th Part VIII: IncubatorTakes Cambridge!
